RecipeHistory.title: RecipeHistory
RecipeHistory.description: Represents a record of recipe generation, including the ingredients used, the timestamp of the request, and the generated recipe.

ingredients.description: Comma-separated list of ingredients used to generate the recipe.

timestamp.description: Timestamp indicating when the recipe was generated.

recipe.description: The generated recipe content, stored as a JSON string.

FavoriteRecipe.title: FavoriteRecipe
FavoriteRecipe.description: Represents a user's saved favorite recipe.

steps.description: The steps to prepare the recipe.

ingredients.description: The ingredients used to generate this recipe.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the recipe was saved.

definition.description: Stores the history of generated recipes, including ingredients, timestamps, and the generated recipe content.
Stores a user's favorite recipes. Only accessible by the user.
